enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Tseliso Makhakhe, Minister of Natural Resources, called for initiation of programmes between developed and developing countries aimed at capacity building.
THE GAMBIA: Sulaymman Samba, Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources, said developed countries must take the lead by reducing emissions and providing resources.
JI should support sustainable development of developing countries.
